settings.header: Lisa Donovan's Wines of the Summer
settings.body: We partnered with Kiss 108 and Lisa's Book Club to create the perfect wine and book pairings for summer!

settings.header: Enter to Win the Ultimate Nantucket Weekend Getaway!
settings.body: Kiss 108 is taking one lucky winner and a guest to Nantucket for a 3 night stay at the Fairway Nantucket Hotel. Winner will receive 2 tickets to the SOLD OUT evening with Elin Hilderbrand event with the Nantucket Book Foundation on Aug 1 + $5000 cash to spend while on the island.

settings.header: The Perfect Summer Wine & Book Pairings
settings.body: Grab your sunscreen, a comfy chair, and dive into Lisa's guide to enjoying the summer with the perfect blend of literature and libations!

settings.heading: Lisa's
settings.description: Picture yourself lounging under the sun, book in hand, and a glass of great wine in the other. This 6 pack is the perfect pairing for relaxing, summer days.

settings.header: Check Out Lisa's Book Club Series
Cruise the Boston Harbor With Us!
settings.body: Join us for the 10th annual Rosé on the Water Cruise June 22nd from 1:15 - 3:45 PM.

settings.form_sub_header: Be the first to know about our newest releases, upcoming events, and everything we’re up to on the wine trail.
